message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm asking for $11,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only afford to pay up to $9,500 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $10,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
